home.heroDescription: Two intensive days to discover Acceptance and Commitment Therapy with one of the world's most respected trainers. Learn to integrate mindfulness, values, and committed action into your clinical practice.
home.quote: Embrace your demons and follow your heart
home.aboutDescription1: Dr. Russ Harris is a physician, psychotherapist, and one of the world's most respected ACT trainers. Author of the international bestseller "The Happiness Trap," translated into more than 30 languages, he has trained more than 90,000 mental health professionals worldwide.
home.aboutDescription2: His unique approach combines scientific rigor and practical accessibility, making ACT's complex concepts immediately applicable in clinical contexts.
home.hexaflexDescription: ACT is based on six fundamental processes that cultivate psychological flexibility, enabling you to live a rich and meaningful life despite inevitable difficulties.
home.process1Description: Being fully aware and connected to the here and now, rather than lost in thoughts of the past or future.
home.process2Description: Welcoming difficult thoughts and emotions without struggling against them, freeing up energy for action.
home.process3Description: Observing thoughts as mental events rather than absolute truths, reducing their grip.
home.process4Description: Developing a transcendent perspective, the "observing self" that can welcome all experiences.
home.process5Description: Clarifying what truly matters in life and using these values as a compass to guide action.
home.process6Description: Acting consistently with one's values, even in the presence of difficult thoughts and emotions.
home.professionalsDescription: This training is designed for therapists, psychologists, physicians, counselors, and coaches who want to enrich their practice with ACT.
home.professional1Description: Integrate ACT into your practice to help your clients develop psychological flexibility.
home.professional2Description: Learn practical tools to support your patients facing chronic pain and illness.
home.professional3Description: Enrich your toolkit with interventions based on values and committed action.
home.professional4Description: Help your clients overcome internal obstacles and live in alignment with their core values.
home.testimonial1: Russ Harris is an exceptional trainer who makes ACT accessible and applicable. His workshops transform clinical practice.
home.testimonial2: Russ's ability to teach ACT with clarity and compassion is remarkable. A training not to be missed.
home.ctaDescription: Places are limited. Book now to secure your participation.

masterclass.title: The Program
masterclass.description1: This intensive 2-day masterclass will immerse you in the heart of Acceptance and Commitment Therapy (ACT). You will discover the theoretical foundations, practical techniques, and clinical applications of this revolutionary therapeutic approach.
masterclass.description2: Through live demonstrations, practical exercises, and case studies, Russ Harris will guide you in learning ACT to transform your professional practice.
masterclass.day1Morning: Introduction to ACT: history and philosophy • The hexaflex model: the 6 fundamental processes • Practical demonstrations and exercises
masterclass.day1Afternoon: Psychological acceptance and cognitive defusion • Contact with the present moment • Practical exercises and case studies
masterclass.day2Morning: Self as context and values • Commitment to action • Integration of ACT processes into practice
masterclass.day2Afternoon: Specific applications: anxiety, depression, chronic pain • Common challenges and pitfalls to avoid • Q&A and clinical cases
masterclass.objective1: Understand the theoretical and philosophical foundations of ACT
masterclass.objective2: Master the 6 fundamental processes of the hexaflex model
masterclass.objective4: Develop skills to integrate ACT into your practice
masterclass.objective5: Manage common challenges and avoid therapeutic pitfalls
masterclass.resource2: Access to video recordings of the training (3 months)
masterclass.ctaDescription: Book your place now for this exceptional masterclass.

aboutRuss.title: About Russ Harris
aboutRuss.subtitle: Physician, psychotherapist, and internationally recognized trainer in Acceptance and Commitment Therapy (ACT).
aboutRuss.bio1: Russ Harris is a physician, psychotherapist, and internationally recognized trainer in Acceptance and Commitment Therapy (ACT). He is the author of several bestsellers, including "The Happiness Trap," translated into more than 30 languages.
aboutRuss.bio2: With more than 20 years of experience, Russ has trained thousands of mental health professionals worldwide. His ability to make ACT accessible and applicable in everyday clinical practice makes him one of the world's most sought-after trainers.
aboutRuss.bio3: In this exclusive masterclass, Russ will share his deep knowledge, proven techniques, and unique insights to help you master ACT and transform your professional practice.
aboutRuss.keyPoint1Description: Author of "The Happiness Trap" and numerous other works on ACT, translated into more than 30 languages.
aboutRuss.keyPoint2Description: Trained thousands of professionals in more than 30 countries worldwide.
aboutRuss.keyPoint3Description: Recognized as one of the world's leading ACT experts with more than 20 years of clinical experience.
aboutRuss.keyPoint4Description: Active clinical practice with a pragmatic approach focused on therapeutic effectiveness.
aboutRuss.ctaDescription: Discover ACT with Russ Harris and transform your professional practice.

contact.formSuccessDescription: We will respond as soon as possible.
